description: Estimating the geothermal potential of volcanic fields via a helicopter-born natural field electromagnetic survey \\[...]
full_summary:
**Natural Field Helicopter Electromagnetic Survey at Mount Cayley, British Columbia**

# Government Tender Announcement

## Reference Information

* Reference Number: PW-22-01011310
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: 5000067749

## Tender Details

* Tender Closing Date: 2022-12-09T16:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2022-11-21
* Expected Contract Start and End Date: Not Specified

## Tender Status

* Tender Status: Expired

## Project Overview

Natural Resources Canada is seeking a contractor to conduct a helicopter-borne natural field electromagnetic (EM) survey at Mount Cayley, British Columbia. The survey is part of a geological research project to assess the geothermal potential of volcanic belts in western Canada.

## Contract Details

* Estimated Quantity: 1
* Duration: Contract Award (2023-03-31)
* Delivery Time Frame: Contract Award (2023-03-31)

## Contact Information

* Name: Farkas, Moira
* Email: moira.farkas@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
* Phone: 403-462-1162
